title: Russian activist jail term quashed - BBC News
text:
Russian activist jail term quashed 22 February 2017 Close share panel Russian supreme court overturns jail sentence imposed on opposition activist Ildar Dadin 
This breaking news story is being updated and more details will be published shortly. Please refresh the page for the fullest version.
